sentences.sContent: I’ve just made a pot of coffee. Would you like some?
sentences.sCn: 我刚煮了一壶咖啡，你想喝点吗？

sentences.sContent: ‘Do you know where the screws are?’ ‘There are some in the garage.’
sentences.sCn: “你知道螺丝钉在哪儿吗？”“车库里有一些。”

words.tran: 重要的人；值得重视的事

trans.tranCn: 一些；某个；大约；相当多的
一些；若干；其中的一部分；（数量不确切时用）有些人
trans.tranOther: a number of people or things or an amount of something, when the exact number or amount is not stated
a fairly large number or amount of something
